description.value:
The tri-flower frond uses its orange blossom, then its yellow blossom, and then its red blossom.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The tri-flower frond chooses one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a [[/save con 11 format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} for 1 hour. While &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} in this way, the target is &Reference[unconscious]{unconscious}. At the end of each minute, the &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

The tri-flower frond chooses one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a [[/save dex 11 format=long]], or it is covered with corrosive sap and takes [[/damage 5 acid average=false]] damage at the start of each of its turns. Dousing the target with water reduces the &Reference[acid]{acid} damage by 1 point per pint or flask of water used.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 1d4 type=piercing average=true]] damage, and the target is &Reference[grappled]{grappled} (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target takes [[/damage 2d4 type=poison average=true]] damage at the start of each of its turns. The red blossom can grapple only one target at a time. Another creature within reach of the tri-flower frond can use its action to end the grapple on the target.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].
